sources.title: Stolen Identity (1953) NOIRESQUE THRILLER
sources.description:
üçïFIRST-TIME on YouTUBEüçï
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX
Stars: Francis Lederer, Joan Camden, Donald Buka
Director: Gunther Fritsch

Exotic actor Turhan Bey steps behind the scenes to produce this forgotten Noiresque thriller: An egotistical concert pianist, his troubled wife, and a desperate taxi driver match wits on a rainy New Year's Eve in Post-war Vienna.

TRIVIA: "Stolen Identity" was the first producing credit for actor Turhan Bey. A German-language version, "Abenteuer In Wein," was shot simultaneously and directed by E. E. Reinert. Francis Lederer portrayed "Claude Manelli" in both versions.

metadata.Plot: A jealous concert pianist murders his wife's lover, then frames an innocent taxi driver for the crime.
metadata.Actors: Donald Buka, Joan Camden, Francis Lederer
